question: "Chief Ministers Akhannaba Sanaroisingi Tengbang (CMAST)" and "Chief Ministergi Artiste Singgi Tengbang (CMAT)" are the new schemes of which state?
explanation:
Chief Minister of Manipur N Biren Singh recently launched two new schemes named \"Chief Ministers Akhannaba Sanaroisingi Tengbang (CMAST)\" and \"Chief Ministergi Artiste Singgi Tengbang (CMAT)\" with an outlay of Rs 7.36 crore and Rs.5.7 crore respectively.
The CMAST scheme aims to provide suitable government job to sportspersons who win medals in international events. Incentive to local clubs, cash awards to medal winners, assistance for purchasing sports items are also included. CMAT scheme aims to support artistes in performing arts, literary arts and visual arts.
